description: This file defines the SplashPage widget used as an initial loading screen in a Flutter application. It handles bootstrapping logic for user session initialization and navigation to either the home or login page based on authentication status.

classes.name: SplashPage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the splash screen of the application.

classes.name: _SplashPageState
classes.description: The state class that manages the splash screen, handles initialization, and navigation logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state object and calls the _boot method to start session bootstrapping.

methods.name: _boot
methods.description: Performs asynchronous session initialization, then navigates to either the home or login page based on login status.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the splash screen, displaying a loading indicator.
